title: References
subtitle: Renowned Brands I've Had the Pleasure to Work With

list.description: Creation of a cross-channel strategy and launch of the e-commerce platform for a building materials leader.
Redesign of the Valrhona Selection B2B platform with Mirakl marketplace and Salesforce API integration.
Design and development of the alpha version of a Magento 2 B2B platform.
Technical leadership of the Magento 2 platform, focus on performance and security.
Technical evolution of Magento sites for Eram, Mellow Yellow, and Bocage.
Management of Magento 2 integration and deployment of the Octopia marketplace.
